main event: On 3 May 1955, an unidentified object was observed at Keflavic Airport, Iceland, displaying erratic motion and great speed.
interesting points: The object was round and oxidized silver in color., It left a small smoke trail before disappearing., The observation lasted between 5 to 8 seconds., Control tower personnel observed a bright light on 8 May 1955, which was much larger and brighter than normal aircraft lights., The object on 5 March 1955 was reported to fly at an altitude of 5,000 to 10,000 feet and was described as oval and silver in color.
witness description: officer of the Operations Section at Keflavic Airport
